title: If there is no data for series, it should display a friendly error message
description: When there is no data available for a series, the application should provide a user-friendly error message to inform the user.
OB: When previewing the series, the application does not display a friendly error message.
EB: When there is no data for a series, the application should display a friendly error message to remind the user.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Open the application and navigate to the series page. 2. Select a series that has no data available. 3. Observe if a friendly error message is displayed or not.
